actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, OMB.

official_title: A bill to aid in the planning and development of an African-American Hall of Fame Sculpture Garden to be located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide funds for the planning and development of the African-American Hall of Fame Sculpture Garden to be located in Fairmount Park, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to aid in the planning and development of an African-American Hall of Fame Sculpture Garden to be located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
